about.summary: Interface to the JAGS MCMC library.

name: r-rjags
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "4-10" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rjags
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rjags_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rjags/rjags_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: bd3e0bdf50b23b63061a0caa2428be585ccbf0b3f5d28eaa690e714e508d0ada
  patches:
    - fix-module-path.diff

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  skip: true  # [win]
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
    - lib/JAGS/modules-4/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}grep              # [win]
    - {{ posix }}autoconf
    - {{ posix }}automake          # [not win]
    - {{ posix }}automake-wrapper  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}pkg-config
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-coda >=0.13
    - jags 4.*
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-coda >=0.13
    - jags 4.*

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rjags')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rjags')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://mcmc-jags.sourceforge.net
  license: GPL (== 2)
  summary: Interface to the JAGS MCMC library.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - micknudsen

# Package: rjags
# Version: 4-9
# Date: 2019-08-07
# Title: Bayesian Graphical Models using MCMC
# Authors@R: c(person("Martyn", "Plummer", role=c("aut","cre"), email="martyn.plummer@gmail.com"), person("Alexey", "Stukalov", role="ctb"), person("Matt", "Denwood", role="ctb"))
# Depends: R (>= 2.14.0), coda (>= 0.13)
# SystemRequirements: JAGS 4.x.y
# URL: http://mcmc-jags.sourceforge.net
# Suggests: tcltk
# Description: Interface to the JAGS MCMC library.
# License: GPL (== 2)
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2019-08-19 11:05:25 UTC; martyn
# Author: Martyn Plummer [aut, cre], Alexey Stukalov [ctb], Matt Denwood [ctb]
# Maintainer: Martyn Plummer <martyn.plummer@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-08-19 13:10:05 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
